bibl.title: with contributions by Inge HOFMANN and István NAGY, Meroe City, an Ancient African Capital. John Garstang's Excavations in the Sudan. Part One: Text; - Part Two: Figures and Plates.

series.title: The Egypt Exploration Society. Occasional Publications.

bibl.note: Publication of the field documentation and find material of Garstang's excavations at Meroe (1909-1914) now kept in the School of Archaeology and Oriental Studies at Liverpool University.
bibl.seg: TÖRÖK László, with contributions by Inge HOFMANN and István NAGY, Meroe City, an Ancient African Capital. John Garstang's Excavations in the Sudan. Part One: Text; - Part Two: Figures and Plates. (The Egypt Exploration Society. Occasional Publications. 12.)
London, The Egypt Exploration Society, 1997, 4°, xxx-287 pp., 13 figg.; - xiv-153 figg. et 96 pll. ISBN 0-85698-137-0. £90.
Publication of the field documentation and find material of Garstang's excavations at Meroe (1909-1914) now kept in the School of Archaeology and Oriental Studies at Liverpool University.
